snippet: A plan to let him play in the next four games is reversed and he won’t be in the starting lineup against Boston until Thursday....
abstract: Boston Red Sox defeat New York Yankees, 5-3.
lead_paragraph: A plan to let him play in the next four games is reversed and he won’t be in the starting lineup against Boston until Thursday.

headline.print_headline: Rodriguez Stays on Bench, Disappointing Some Fans
headline.main: Alex Rodriguez Stays on Bench for Yankees in Lineup Dispute
